alert.note: Alert for Cass; Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Richland; Steele; Traill; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 11 at 2:54AM CST until February 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Less than one inch of additional snow accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will cause whiteout conditions, especially in open country. * WHERE...The Red River Valley. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on very slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce the visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
